summary: Disguised as a beggar monk, Ryunosuke's harrassed along the road by the rowdy members of a country dojo or fencing school malingering outside their fencing hall.
cast: Raizô Ichikawa|Tamao Nakamura|Katsuhiko Kobayashi|Kôjirô Hongô|Hajime Mitamura|Saburo Niwamata|Ryûzô Shimada|Mieko Kondô|Hiroko Yajima|Michiyo Ai|Akiko Inoue|Kimiko Tachibana|Yoichi Mashio|Shinobu Araki|Bontarô Miake|Saburô Sakai|Konparu Nanri|Ryônosuke Azuma|Eigorô Onoe|Sôji Shibata|Kazue Tamaki|Tokio Oki|Kôichi Aihara|Toshihiko Takeya|Gen Kimura|Tochitaro Daimaru|Kiyoshi Kasuga|Isamu Sakurai|Kenji Ideno|Haruyasu Fuji|Yoshiki Matsuoka|Masao Minami|Hiroyuki Mori|Jun Arimura|Kazuo Shima|Masafumi Takechi|Saeko Takatsuki|Kanae Kobayashi|Fujiko Yamamoto
title: Daibosatsu toge: Kanketsu-hen
